snippet: Susan G. Komen for the Cure announced the most significant leadership shake-up since its short-lived attempt to cut financing for breast cancer services provided by Planned Parenthood.
abstract: Susan G Komen for the Cure announces that founder Nancy G Brinker will leave her post as chief executive and group's president, Liz Thompson, will resign; changes constitute the group's most significant leadership shake-up since its short-lived attempt to cut financing for breast cancer services provided by Planned Parenthood.
lead_paragraph: Susan G. Komen for the Cure announced the most significant leadership shake-up since its short-lived attempt to cut financing for breast cancer services provided by Planned Parenthood.

headline.seo: Susan G. Komen for the Cure Changes Leadership

keywords.value: Komen, Susan G, for the Cure
